name: onKeyDown
desc: Fires when a component (while focused) receives a keyDown event. When this trigger fires, the following variables will be set: triggeredKey and triggeredKeyCode
exampleDesc: s example will fire when the x key is pressed.

propSpec.desc: The id of the component we want to listen for mount events on.
When set to true the event will be consumed and as such, not perform its original function. For example, consuming backspace will cause an input to not have its last character removed.
